author: Staff Reporter
text:
Collector Sajjansingh R. Chavan on Monday convened a meeting of zonal officers appointed to the district for election duty and explained to them their duties and responsibilities as set by the Election Commission of India.

All the 117 zonal officers appointed for the six Assembly constituencies – Vilavancode (20), Padmanabhapuram (19), Killiyoor (20), Nagarcoil (17), Kanyakumari (21) and Colachel (20) – participated in the meeting.

The Collector told the officers to collect zonal map from the respective Tahsildars. The zonal officers should travel only in the routes given to them in the route map.

They should inform Returning /Assistant Returning Officers about poll code violations immediately.

The meeting was attended by District Revenue Officer S. Elango, Padmanabhapuram Sub-Collector Shreya P. Singh and RDO S. Madhiyazhagan.

title: Meeting on poll duties and responsibilities
